ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify

Class StateChangeTransaction<T extends RemoteObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.Transaction<T>
      • ca.ualberta.cs.wrkify.StateChangeTransaction<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleTransaction1, SimpleTransaction2, TaskAcceptBidTransaction, TaskAddImageTransaction, TaskAddOrReplaceBidTransaction, TaskCancelBidTransaction, TaskCheckListTransaction, TaskCompleteTransaction, TaskDelImageTransaction, TaskDescriptionTransaction, TaskLocationTransaction, TaskTitleTransaction, TaskUnassignTransaction, UserSetEmailTransaction, UserSetPhoneNumberTransaction

    public abstract class StateChangeTransaction<T extends RemoteObject>
extends Transaction<T>
    Transaction models an atomic change to a RemoteObject transactions subclasses define the apply() function in order to implement the specific behavior.
    See Also:
    RemoteObject
